game.title: The Lost Temple of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient scroll from the depths of the Lost Temple.
game.description: An ancient text speaks of a powerful artifact hidden within the long-abandoned temple. Retrieve it to unlock its secrets.

tasks.objective: Explore the entrance chamber of the Lost Temple and find the hidden passage.
tasks.description: Be cautious of traps and puzzles as you navigate through the entrance chamber. Find the pressure plate to unlock the passage.

tasks.objective: Solve the Mirror Puzzle in the Reflection Room.
tasks.description: Use your wits to solve the mirror puzzle and unlock the door to the next chamber. Be quick, as time is running out!

tasks.objective: Retrieve the ancient scroll from the treasure room.
tasks.description: The final chamber holds the ancient scroll. Be prepared to face a powerful entity guarding it.
